resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exam Technique/Application to Marketing Mix</string>
            <string language="es">Técnica de examen/aplicación para Marketing mix</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicníc Scrúdaithe/Cur i bhfeidhm ar Mheascán Margaíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfung Technique/Application zur 
Marketing-Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Examen Technique/Application au mélange de 
vente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exam Technique/Application à mistura do 
marketing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Exam Technique/Application alla miscela di 
vendita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνική/εφαρμογή διαγωνισμών στο μάρκετινγκ του 
μίγματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Details of a structured approach to tackling the Ordinary Level paper with a four-step approach outlined. Question on Marketing Mix and suggested solution are provided.</string>
            <string language="es">Detalles de una metodología estructurada para abordar el examen de nivel ordinario con un esquema de metodología de cuatro pasos. Se incluyen preguntas sobre Marketing Mix y soluciones sugeridas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sonraí maidir le cur chuige struchtúrtha le dul i ngleic leis an bpáipéar Gnáthleibhéil le himlíniú ar chur chuige ceithre chéim. Cuirtear ceist ar Mheascán Margaíochta chomh maith le freagra molta ar fáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business in Action</string>
            <string language="es">Negocios en acción</string>
            <string language="ga">Business in Action</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Details einer strukturierten Annäherung an das 
Anpacken des gewöhnlichen waagerecht ausgerichteten Papiers mit einer
four-step Annäherung umrissen. Frage über Marketing-Mischung 
und vorgeschlagene Lösung werden zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détails d'une approche structurée à aborder le
papier de niveau ordinaire avec une approche à quatre phases tracée 
les grandes lignes. La question sur le mélange de vente et la 
solution suggérée sont fournies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detalhes de uma aproximação estruturada a 
tackling o papel nivelado ordinário com uma aproximação four-step 
esboçada. A pergunta na mistura do marketing e a solução 
sugerida são fornecidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particolari di un metodo strutturato ad 
affrontare la carta livellata ordinaria con un metodo four-step 
descritto. La domanda sulla miscela di vendita e la soluzione 
suggerita sono fornite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι λεπτομέρειες μιας δομημένης προσέγγισης στην 
αντιμετώπιση του συνηθισμένου εγγράφου επιπέδων με ένα 
τέσσερις-βήμα πλησιάζουν περιγραμμένος. Η ερώτηση στο 
μάρκετινγκ του μίγματος και η προτεινόμενη λύση παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft in der Tätigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires dans l'action</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio na ação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio nell'azione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση στην ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
